message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $950,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. I believe this will be a mutually beneficial deal. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $820,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with both our interests.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $820,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need at least $900,000 to make this worthwhile.  Let's meet in the middle and see if we can find a mutually agreeable price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $875,000 for your product. I hope this proposal is more in line with your expectations.
Bob,  I see we're getting closer.  I'm willing to go down to $890,000. This is a fair price, given the value you'll get from this product.  Let's make this deal happen.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $880,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
